channel.title: What's allowed in this board?
channel.description:
Anything regarding the design, development, and implementation of both websites and web applications (if you don't know what a web application is, [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Web_application]look here[/url].)
Design should be related to CSS and markup. Any graphics requests or creations should be put in the [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,29.0.html]Graphics[/url] section. Development should be specific to web languages, such as Javascript, PHP, ASP.NET languages, and anything else you can think of for web. Implementation questions can be in regards to setting up a CMS like Drupal or Joomla, or setting up a forum like SMF or VisualBulletin. Whatever it is, this is the place to ask it.
If you need clarification, reply in this topic or message me. Thanks. :)

item.title: What's allowed in this board?
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Morpheus-:

Hello, I am new this community. Tbh i am a noob, can anybody please tell me if requesting domain / hosting is allowed?

You can’t organise payments through this sites if you mean you’re trying to purchase one. There are plenty of free webhosts around and you can get domains for next to nothing from http://crazydomains.co.uk. You can’t really request these things, it’s just a bit absurd really.

Read full topic
